synopsis.text: After his promising debut in the Prism King Cup, Ichijo Shin begins high school at Kakyoin Academy. Meanwhile, tensions rise in the Prism Show world as Hiro claims the title of Prism King from Schwarz Rose's leader Norizuki Jin. In response, Jin proposes PRISM.1, a competition to decide a new king between the rival agencies of Schwarz Rose and Edel Rose. As PRISM.1 draws near, Over The Rainbow members Koji, Hiro, and Kazuki leave Edel Rose to start their own agency. Amidst the chaos, Yukinojo struggles with conflicting loyalties between his kabuki training and desire to become a Prism Star. Despite his talent in both areas, he feels dissatisfied and turns to his father for advice. His father urges Yukinojo to leave the Prism Show world entirely. With PRISM.1 pitting Edel Rose against the Prism King himself, the young men seeking to become Prism Stars face intense pressure. This story follows their struggles and conflicts as they pour their hearts into Prism Shows, competing to capture the audience with stunning visual performances.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
